sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
puzzles someone
, nekoga zbega, ker tistega ne razume.

seg.quote: There was one sentence which puzzled me deeply.

sense.def:
To puzzle over something
pomeni močno se truditi, da bi našli odgovor ali pojasnilo za nekaj.

cit.quote: razbijati si glavo, beliti si glavo

seg.quote: Astronomers had puzzled over these white ovals for some time.

sense.def:
A puzzle
je vprašanje, igra ali igrača, pri kateri moramo dobro razmišljati, da pridemo do pravega odgovora ali da jo pravilno sestavimo.

A puzzle
je tudi vse, kar težko razumemo.

seg.quote: The motives of the film-makers remain a puzzle.

sense.def:
To puzzle out a problem
pomeni močno razmišljati o nečem in na koncu najti rešitev.

seg.quote: She sat down and tried to puzzle out the reports.
